meta.title: Partner With Us | SeaNeB
meta.description: Grow your local business with SeaNeB. Zero commission, maximum growth. Join India's growing digital platform for local and small businesses.

intro.heading: Join the Local Business Revolution
paragraphs: Welcome to SeaNeB, India's growing digital platform for local and small businesses. Our mission is simple — to empower entrepreneurs, shop owners, and service providers to grow online, attract more customers, and showcase their businesses across India.
Whether you're a small business owner, local service provider, or startup, SeaNeB helps you connect, promote, and grow without worrying about hefty commissions or hidden fees.
Partner with SeaNeB and take your business to the next level.

pricing.heading: Commission-Free Business Growth Plans
pricing.subheading: Find the plan that best fits your business goals. SeaNeB offers lifetime 0% commission — you keep 100% of your earnings.

plans.name: Startup
plans.label: New small businesses or startups looking to gain visibility.

plans.name: Professional
plans.label: Growing businesses ready to expand their online presence.

plans.name: Expert
plans.label: Established MSMEs or franchises looking for maximum exposure.

whyPartner.heading: Why Partner with SeaNeB?
whyPartner.subheading: SeaNeB helps you boost your revenue, connect with local customers, and grow your business visibility — all without commission cuts.

reasons.title: Access to a Large Business Network
reasons.description: Join a fast-growing platform connecting thousands of small and local businesses with customers searching for trusted services nearby.

reasons.title: Simple Business Management
reasons.description: Manage your business listing, leads, and promotions — all from one easy dashboard designed for local entrepreneurs.

reasons.title: Enhanced Visibility & Credibility
reasons.description: Get discovered by new customers and gain credibility as a verified business listed on SeaNeB.

reasons.title: Smart Promotion Tools
reasons.description: Promote your offers, deals, or seasonal discounts directly to customers looking for businesses like yours.

reasons.title: Customer Engagement
reasons.description: SeaNeB makes it easier to engage with your audience through reviews, messages, and feedback — building stronger trust and repeat customers.

reasons.title: Save Marketing Costs
reasons.description: Skip expensive ads. SeaNeB's optimised platform gives your business visibility at a fraction of the marketing cost.

reasons.title: Increased Productivity
reasons.description: Our tools help you organise your promotions, track engagement, and measure performance — so you can focus on growth, not paperwork.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.subheading: Getting started is simple. Follow these four easy steps to launch your business on SeaNeB.

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.description: List your business or service on SeaNeB and start reaching local customers instantly.

steps.title: Showcase Your Business
steps.description: Add your business details, offers, and promotions to attract new customers.

steps.title: Connect & Grow
steps.description: Receive direct leads and messages from potential clients, with zero commission.

steps.title: Expand Your Reach
steps.description: Use SeaNeB's local visibility tools to stand out in your area and grow your customer base.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Here are some common questions about our company.
faq.contactSuffix: Our team will be happy to guide you.

items.question: How do I get started as a SeaNeB partner?
items.answer: You can easily sign up through our "Partner With Us" page and create your business profile within minutes.

items.question: What are the costs involved?
items.answer: SeaNeB offers affordable monthly plans with 0% commission — you only pay for visibility, not sales.

items.question: Can I list multiple businesses?
items.answer: Yes! Our Professional and Enterprise plans allow multiple listings under a single SeaNeB account.

cta.heading: Ready to Grow?
cta.subheading: Partner with SeaNeB today and take the first step toward digital visibility, local recognition, and long-term success.
